Two servers shared a prime by mistake. Recover Bob's message, intercepted as 688306545656259898963194071231721101420309954475774360634177148213465820772756218765815254674638778825001471450877526708609424916539732053142099378725222487112123146695719014534430397421754511078995822736948481631405337997706943975, using each server's public key.

The flag format is flag{...}
n=916675777195168433419928706521413479547449948691104735389302980595210565394729344973604435994387863744120757597985064867858466736885821847800573113959254625515110975005005846264044557332964104773027457593593638301161814891164294707, n2=1340369073163951899177376034111462018010490205592801847736600267006717506820731520921175032601784755349702544831144465275731475221597693627766359675442595233925556124057223233474341487513424888703345926663379622342895653810343624473, e=611707711556142259070077385045349129606830673440831856199792191153725296960115824908666318408326451986283381070394084405994085236125371232312848766198862132490014839859894370198283152375511564639572419988607062736426557705761911499

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{6w66znkp}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 688306545656259898963194071231721101420309954475774360634177148213465820772756218765815254674638778825001471450877526708609424916539732053142099378725222487112123146695719014534430397421754511078995822736948481631405337997706943975
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=916675777195168433419928706521413479547449948691104735389302980595210565394729344973604435994387863744120757597985064867858466736885821847800573113959254625515110975005005846264044557332964104773027457593593638301161814891164294707, n2=1340369073163951899177376034111462018010490205592801847736600267006717506820731520921175032601784755349702544831144465275731475221597693627766359675442595233925556124057223233474341487513424888703345926663379622342895653810343624473, e=611707711556142259070077385045349129606830673440831856199792191153725296960115824908666318408326451986283381070394084405994085236125371232312848766198862132490014839859894370198283152375511564639572419988607062736426557705761911499
extra_info: p=35545189347475628947534706392593840578189103880998255358546476237511364599132751561343642156391296647945039850889541, q=25789025013599189101958233746225238987722142424730392459696010987583628576869647156623500452642915619840511994703127, q2=37708874190007461293877915863988258180431618111461451758406313148079559977063644859865934061140921181360400853606853, φ(n)=916675777195168433419928706521413479547449948691104735389302980595210565394729344973604435994387863744120757597985003533644105662067772354860434294879688714268805246357187603776819462339788102374309490450984604088894029339318702040, φ(n2)=1340369073163951899177376034111462018010490205592801847736600267006717506820731520921175032601784755349702544831144392021667937738507452215144103093343836613203563664350106280684955896588848692306924717087162090125066348369639128080
